Question
========
What does it mean to clone a repository?

Answerlist
----------
* Delete a repository and start over
* Copy a repository from GitHub.com to your local machine for the first time
* Upload local changes to GitHub.com
* Rename a repository on GitHub.com

Solution
========
Cloning creates a local copy of a repository you do not yet have on your computer.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
